So I had to use chat and my experience is that operators mostly seem to answer the question before the last one I asked, or answer a question I never asked.2. I changed the account from which the direct debit is taken.  I entered the details correctly and your web site accepted them.  The first I knew of a problem was when I received a text message telling me that immediate payment was required and that my account had been suspended.  To find out what had happened I had to first pay the monthly amount.  That was challenging because I logged into your website using my laptop, tried to pay and got the very uninformative error message of "Oops, something went wrong".  I ended up paying by phone.  I could then ring my bank and found out that iDMobile hadn't set up the direct debit properly - the money had been taken from my account but because the bank hadn't received the necessary notification about the direct debit, it was immediately returned to my account.
